about.details:
Incorporated in 1996, Tatva Chintan Pharma Chem Limited is a chemical manufacturing company that manufactures structure directing agents (SDAs), phase transfer catalyst (PTCs), pharmaceutical and agrochemical intermediates, and other specialty chemicals. It is among the largest manufacturer of SDAs for zeolites in India.

The company serves customers across industries i.e. automotive, petroleum, agrochemicals, dyes and pigments, paints and coatings, pharmaceutical, personal care, and others. Its products are not only sold in India but also export to 25+ countries all over the world such as the USA, Germany, South Africa, China, and the UK. In FY 2020, total export contributed to 76% of total revenue from operations.

Merck, Bayer AG, Ipox Chemicals, Laurus labs, Navin Fluorine International Limited, Atul Limited, Otsuka Chemicals, SRF Limited, Hawks Chemical Company, Firmenich Aromatics Prod Pvt Ltd, and Divi's laboratories are a few of customers of the company. Currently, it has two manufacturing facilities at Ankleshwar and Dahej in Gujarat.

Competitive strengths

  • Leading manufacturer of structure directing agents and phase transfer catalyst.
  • Diversified product portfolio.
  • Global market presence with customer base across industries.
  • Strategically located manufacturing facility in Gujarat with close proximity to Hazira Port.
  • Experienced promoters and managers team.
  • Strong financial performance track record.

faqs.question: What is the Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO?
faqs.answer:
Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO is a main-board IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹500.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹1083 per share. The minimum order quantity is 13.

The IPO opens on July 16, 2021, and closes on July 20, 2021.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: The Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO opens on July 16, 2021 and closes on July 20, 2021.

faqs.answer: Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO lot size is 13, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,079.

faqs.question: How to apply for Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO will be done on Monday, July 26, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, July 28, 2021. Check the Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Tatva Chintan Pharma IPO listing date is on Thursday, July 29, 2021.
